name: UKCoreDischargeMethod
title: UK Core Discharge Method
description: A set of codes that define the method of discharge from a hospital provider spell.

contains.display: Not applicable (Hospital Provider Spell not finished at episode end (i.e. not discharged) or current episode unfinished)
Not applicable - hospital provider spell not yet finished (i.e. not discharged)
Patient discharged by a relative or advocate
Patient discharged by Mental Health Review Tribunal (MHRT), Home Secretary or court
Patient discharged by mental health review tribunal, Home Secretary or Court
Patient discharged him/herself or was discharged by a relative or advocate
Patient discharged on clinical advice or with clinical consent
Patient discharged on clinical advice or with clinical consent
